name: Global Game Jam: Find Poster Nutbag
name_original: Global Game Jam: Find Poster Nutbag
description:
You awake on the morning of a snowstorm and step out side to find that your dog Poster Nutbag has escaped!  Where will your search to find your beloved companion take you?

Credits:

Richard Bingley

Adam  Guimond-Pishuktie

Lael Kronick

Alex Smithers
